summary: This is an email chain from May 26, 2020, between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding the creation of video clips from Ghislaine Maxwell's deposition videos for the Epstein investigation. The emails discuss technical issues with accessing the video files and a deadline related to a Thursday meeting.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Her deposition videos are the subject of the email chain; clips are being created from her testimony for the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Thursday meeting with MI
events.description: A meeting is referenced for which video clips from Ghislaine Maxwell's deposition need to be prepared.

locations: Usa.doj.gov\clouaNYS\StAndrewASharecRUSvEpstein-2018801618\Investigation\# 2018 SDNY investigation\Subpoena llett ia,202CS, third subpoena response\Videos
keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was working on creating video clips from Ghislaine Maxwell's deposition videos in May 2020.
The clips were to cover approximately 11 specific question and answer sequences from her deposition, as listed in an attached document.
The video files were stored in a specific DOJ shared folder and required a special viewer program to access.
The work was being done in advance of a meeting scheduled for that Thursday, suggesting ongoing investigative or legal preparation related to the Epstein case.
